entries.name: deprecate(name, repl, year, month)
entries.desc: Simple deprecation method that deprecates name by wrapping it up in a dummy method. It warns on each call to the dummy method telling the user of repl (unless repl is :none) and the year/month that it is planned to go away.

entries.name: skip_during()
entries.desc: Temporarily turn off warnings. Intended for tests only.
